flawed_nl_solution:
Randy has 20 - 12 = <<20-12=5>>5 years until he is 20.
He must practice 10000 / 5 = <<10000/5=2000>>2000 hours a year to become an expert.
There are 52 weeks in a year - 2 weeks of vacation Randy plans to take = <<52-2=50>>50 weeks of practice for Randy.
Randy will practice Monday - Friday, which is 5 days a week, so 50 weeks x 5 days = <<50*5=250>>250 days of practice each year.
Randy will need to practice 2000 / 250 = <<2000/250=8>>8 hours each day.
#### 8

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 8, not 5. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
